content: धेनुः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [धयति सुतान्, धीयते वत्सैर्वा, धे-नु इच्च <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} A cow, milch-cow; धेनु धीराः सूनृतां वाचमाहुः <ls>U. 5. 31.</ls> {@--2@} The female of a species (affixed to the names of other animals in this sense); as खड्गधेनुः, वडवधेनुः &c. {@--3@} The earth. (Sometimes at the end of <ab>comp.</ab> धेनु forms a diminutive; as असिधेनुः, खड्गधेनुः). {@--4@} A gift, present.
